mapper.sql: id, name, organizer, time, area_code, resume, pic_url, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into t_cultural_item
id,
name,
organizer,
time,
area_code,
resume,
pic_url,
create_time,
update_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{organizer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{resume,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update t_cultural_item
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organizer = #{organizer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resume = #{resume,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic_url = #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_cultural_item set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organizer = #{organizer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resume = #{resume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic_url = #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update.foreach: INSERT INTO t_cultural_item (id, name, organizer, time, area_code, resume, pic_url,create_time,update_time) VALUES (#{item.id},#{item.name},#{item.organizer},#{item.time},#{item.areaCode},#{item.resume},#{item.picUrl},now(),now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name=#{item.name},organizer=#{item.organizer},time=#{item.time},area_code=#{item.areaCode},resume=#{item.resume} ,pic_url=#{item.picUrl},update_time=now()
